A sermon against rebellion shewing deceivers to be deceived in their wicked mistakes. Preached at St. Paul's, October 20th 1661. By Sam. Stone, M.A. Stone, Samuel, 1602-1663.
[6], 43, [1] p.
printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-lane, London : M.DC.LXII. [1662]
With an advertisement on the final page. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
